frame.name: Turning_out
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> turns out to be true in someone's knowledge of the world. This may be recognized with evidence or in certain circumstances. The cognizer whose beliefs are affected is not expressed.
<ex><fex name="State_of_affairs">Hybrid grass</fex> may <t>prove</t> <fex name="State_of_affairs">to be a valuable fuel source</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: State_of_affairs
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of affairs that a cognizer realizes.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is realized.</def-root>
